posts.post_title: WTB: N172 Tony Mullane and Scott Stratton
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone I am looking for a N172 old judge of Tony Mullane and Scott Stratton.  Beaters, trimmed/skinned, or complete examples are all fine.  If anyone has one of these players for sale please message me at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]

As always thanks for the help

Tony Turner
